It sounds like you're in for a treat with some futuristic noir! If you're looking for a blend of action and adventure, I'd recommend giving 'The Fifth Element' a watch. Starring the charismatic Bruce Willis and Milla Jovovich, it offers an intriguing plot set in a vibrant future world.

Alternatively, 'Star Trek' (2009) is another great option if you enjoy sci-fi and character dynamics. With its gripping storyline and the return of Leonard Nimoy as Spock, it promises to be an exciting addition to your movie night! Enjoy the journey through these futuristic noir landscapes!

If you're looking for a more character-driven plot with some romance, "Restless" featuring Mia Wasikowska, Hayley Atwell, and Rufus Sewell could be a great choice. It tells the story of a group of friends experiencing their last summer of freedom before facing adulthood. Enjoy exploring these recommendations!

I'd highly recommend "The Monuments Men" for you. This film is a thrilling World War II adventure starring George Clooney, Bill Murray, and Matt Damon, who work together as an unlikely team to rescue priceless art from the hands of German thieves. It's an engaging story with a unique historical backdrop that might appeal to you, given your interest in war-themed movies.

If you're looking for something more mystery-oriented and less action-packed, you might also enjoy "Smilla's Sense of Snow," which features Julia Ormond in a captivating role as a half Inuit woman investigating the suspicious death of a young boy from her building. It's a thought-provoking film that blends elements of mystery and suspense.
